titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to allow an exception for the weight limits for certain towing trucks.
To amend title 23, United States Code, to allow an exception for the weight limits for certain towing trucks.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: Allows as an exception to federal weight limits the operation of a tow truck, weighing no more than 150,000 pounds, which removes a disabled vehicle from the Interstate System to a storage or repair facility 100 miles or less from the point where such vehicle becomes disabled.
